synopsis.text: Pyrenees-based young boy Sebastian finds solace in the companionship of a misunderstood white Pyrenees Mountain Dog, Belle, as they embark on a daring adventure to evade police and locate Sebastian's long-lost mother. Ostracized by his peers for his family situation, Sebastian's life takes a turn when he befriends Belle, who is falsely accused of crimes and labeled the "White Devil." Together with his little dog Poochie, Sebastian leaves his adoptive family behind to save Belle and search for the mother he believes is still alive. As they traverse the mountain range between France and Spain, the trio faces challenges and narrowly escapes capture, all while forming an unbreakable bond.
